reviewText: Incredible. Pugh has an incredible gift to tell a story and he does a fantastic job examining what's really flawing our society. It's real and Pugh captures it tremendously. Absolutely recommend this.

All students deserve a good education and this film tells the story of one innovative teacher who is making a difference. Great narratives from students, parents, and faculty accompany an explanation of his teaching techniques and the positive influence they have on students. This film is perfect for teachers and people interested in learning more about education!
